content.en_US:
Fertile (i.e. can be bred) isotope which yields [[uranium-233|Uranium-233]]. Can either be irradiated in an [[RBMK]] to produce [[thorium fuel|Thorium Fuel]] or combined with uranium-233. Thorium-derived fuels are generally cost-effective but not very powerful. Also usable in [[liquid thorium salt|Liquid Thorium Salt]], a powerful [[PWR]] coolant (turning it into a molten salt reactor) which yields tons of uranium-233 quickly.

Slightly radioactive.
